_comment: Server settings for Factorio. See: https://wiki.factorio.com/Multiplayer
name: Factorio Server
_comment_visibility: public: Game will be visible in the public game browser. private: Only players with the password/link can join.
_comment_credentials: Your factorio.com login credentials for game visibility and mod updates
_comment_token: Authentication token. May be used instead of password. Get it from https://factorio.com/profile
_comment_game_password: Password required to join the server. Leave empty for no password.
_comment_require_user_verification: When true, the server verifies that connecting players are logged in to factorio.com
_comment_max_players: Maximum number of players allowed. 0 = unlimited.
_comment_max_upload_in_kilobytes_per_sec: Upload speed limit in KiB/s. 0 = unlimited.
_comment_max_upload_slots: Maximum number of concurrent upload streams. 0 = unlimited.
_comment_minimum_latency_in_ticks: Minimum latency to ensure smooth gameplay. 0 = auto.
_comment_max_heartbeats_per_second: Network heartbeat frequency. Higher = more responsive but more bandwidth.
_comment_ignore_player_limit_for_returni: Allow returning players to join even if server is full.
_comment_allow_commands: Allow console commands. Options: true, false, admins-only
_comment_autosave_slots: Number of autosave slots before overwriting. Server only option.
_comment_afk_autokick_interval: Kick players after N minutes of inactivity. 0 = never.
_comment_auto_pause: Pause the game when no players are connected. Highly recommended for multiplayer.
_comment_only_admins_can_pause_the_game: Only admins can pause/unpause the game.
_comment_autosave_only_on_server: Only the server saves (not the client).
_comment_non_blocking_saving: Experimental: Save in background thread. May cause desyncs.
_comment_minimum_segment_size_peer_count: Peer count threshold for segment size.
_comment_maximum_segment_size_peer_count: Peer count threshold for max segment size.
